ygData.subject: Re: Shadowcaster
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been thinking about it too. One mod I d like to make which is something he d switch on or off at the gun is a beacon setting. When this setting is used,

I've been thinking about it too. One mod I'd like to
make which is something he'd switch on or off at the
gun is a beacon setting. When this setting is used, it
adds a subroutine on the virus where the victim's
comlink is sent open and a coded sos signal on one of
the victims own side's channels would be repeatedly
sent.  Also, Shadowcaster is more likely than not in
the evewnt of having to use the lock pistol and then
cloak himself and wait for the victim's own side to
arrive to retrieve the victim of the weapon.

--- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
OOC: About the Lock pistol, it would be better to use
it only on 
Nightstalk, as you pointed out. This way, he won't be
too powerful 
(although I doubt his sense of ethos would permit him
to kill a 
Locked char). Anyways, play reasonably and it'll be
great!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Name: Shadowcaster
> Alliegance: Maximal (formerly Decepticon)
> Function: Guardian
> Motto: "Beware of the shadows..... I may be one of
> them- even yours!"
> 
> Profile: Shadowcaster was originally built by the
> Quintessons (back when the quints were still
> manufacturing Autobots and Decepticons as a
wholesale
> commodity) as a prototype of what was to be their
> finest accomplishment- the ultimate
> assassin/intelligence robot.  
> 
> Virtually unstoppable at the time, his strength and
> physical prowess were unmatched by any Decepticon
ever
> created.  His name comes from his model name-
> Shadowcaster.  The reason for this designation, was
> because he and all others of the class of robots
that
> were to go into main production were designed to be
> manufactured with a then state of the art cloaking
> device, and stealth jamming system- rendering them 
> undetectable till they choose to reveal themselves. 

> 
> The Quintessons had created - in him - the perfect
> military robot to sell off to their clients, or so
it
> seemed.  However, there was a 'flaw' in his program-
> Shadowcaster not only possessed emotions but also
the
> soul of a noble samurai- something that would
> essentially ruin their latest creation.
> 
> Shadowcaster was aware of their intentions, however
> just like a true samurai, he was unable to a stop
> them.  
> 
> However before the Quintessons could correct the
> 'glitch', they fell foul of the uprising led by
Alpha
> Trion, in which Shadowcaster was a more than willing
> participant.  Shadowcaster soon discovered something
> which he found he immensely liked- peace.  In true
> samurai tradition, he decided then and there, that
it
> was his obligation to maintain the peace and to
> protect the weak (mainly the Autobots).
> 
> However, nothing - including peace - lasts forever. 
> It wasn't long before the warring instincts of the
> other Decepticons found an outlet- the Autobots, and
> ultimately, the universe.  When the war started up,
> Shadowcaster decided then and there, that he could
no
> longer remain a Decepticon and maintain his beliefs-
> and so he chose the later: secretly swearing
> allegiance to the Autobots, as well as an oath to
> protect them from his fellow Decepticons, as he
views
> them as innocents- unprepared for war. He starts
> miraculously appearing in battle after battle,
> continually saving the Autobots- only to then
> disappear into the shadows. A legend soon sprung up-
a
> legend which brought hope to the Autobots, and fear
to
> the Decepticons.
> 
> 
> However, there were a some who knew that his
existence
> was real- one of those being Alpha Trion; the other
> Straxus- when Shadowcaster revealed himself to him-
> before permanently taking him offline.  After the
> second war, Shadowcaster's friendship with Alpha
Trion
> grew.  In that time, Shadowcaster learned a great
deal
> about the sciences, and became a skilled doctor and
> programmer.  However, he insisted that Alpha Trion,
> not reveal his existence, as there was always the
> possibility  that the Decepticons might find another
> Straxus, and begin a new war.
> 
> Sure enough, he was right.  Only this time the
> Decepticons could not only fly, but they were
> stronger, better armoured and more powerful than
ever
> before.  Shadowcaster saw the writing on the wall,
and
> insisted that Alpha Trion assist him in developing a
> reconstruction process for the Autobots.  For as
much
> as he hated to admit it, this was one war which he
> could not win alone.  They commenced the project in
> earnest- with Shadowcaster making Alpha Trion keep
his
> existence still as a secret.
> 
> It was not long however, that the first of the new
> Autobots would come about.  Shadowcaster saw Alpha
> Trion bring the almost lifeless body of Orion Pax
in,
> knowing instinctively that he was someone special. 
So
> that Shadowcaster could work unseen, Alpha Trion
> insisted that the Aerialbots remain outside.  In the
> months that followed, they successfully rebuilt
> numerous Autobots, with none aware that they owed
> their continued existence to two Autobots- not just
> one.
> 
> Not long after, he had Alpha Trion make all the
> necessary modifications on him, so that he could
> destroy these new Decepticons as easily as he had
the
> older ones.  He then recommenced (in secret) his
> active role in the war.  During the time that the
> Autobots were still on Cybertron, he destroyed
several
> Decepticon super weapons and killed off many would
be
> assassins, with noone but Alpha Trion knowing of his
> existence.
> 
> After the Autobots left on the voyage that would
> ultimately bring both them and the Decepticons to
> Earth, Shadowcaster began waging his one man war on
> the Decepticons more intensely than ever, inflicting
> one punishing raid on the Decepticons after another-
> nothing large enough to finish them, just enough to
> greatly aid the small number of Autobots left
behind.
> 
> During the events of 'The Heavy Metal War' he
sneaked
> aboard the space bridge and travelled to Earth after
> overhearing a transmission from Megatron to
Shockwave,
> and, after reaching the Ark, used a backdoor code
into
> one of his greatest creations- Teletran One - to
> reconfigure himself into a more Earth-like form
(using
> the configuration that would later be used on the
> Autobot Tracks), then creating false security logs,
> and storing the real ones in an area of it's memory
> not accessible to any other Autobot.  After that
time
> he continued his one man war- both on Cybertron and
> Earth.
> 
> However, by 2005, the Decepticons had taken over all
> of Cybertron, forcing him to change his tactics.
Being
> careful not to reveal the true extent of his powers,
> he joined the Decepticons again- only this time as a
> well planted spy- relaying what information when he
> could, while still remaining anonymous. During the
> attack by Unicron, Shadowcaster disappeared into the
> shadows....... 
> 
> After the planet was liberated due to the attack on
> Cybertron, he went back into the shadows, observing
> Rodimus Prime's actions and helping where he could. 
> At the end of the third great war, he came out from
> hiding and joined one of the numerous teams of
> Autobots who were responsible for hunting down the
> Decepticons and bring them to justice one way or
> another.
> 
> However, with the end of the signing of the Pax
> Cybertronia he found himself out of place, deep down
> wanting a peaceful existence, but the warrior in him
> being ever vigilant- convinced that it was only a
> matter of time before the Decepticons returned to
> their former ways in the same numbers as from the
> past. At the same time though, in this time of peace
> he felt like an anachronism, a guardian with no need
> to guard those he was sworn to protect. 
Begrudgingly,
> he found himself undergoing the great upgrade and
> reverting to the role of scientist, at which he
found
> he excelled. However, his latent abilities could not
> curb his latent fear that the Decepticons or their
> decendants would rise up again and strike the moment
> he let his guard down.  
> 
> As things would turn out he found himself as part of
> one of the many science exploration voyages to
> numerous different worlds.  It was on this voyage
that
> he would meet a bot that would change everything in
> his life a female Maximal by the name of Phoenix. 
> Phoenix and Shadowcaster formed a kinship almost
> immediately, with him being drawn to her youthful
> innocence and hope-filled outlook, and her being
drawn
> to this weary battered soul.  At first things were
> awkard when they talked of times past or things
> started to become intimate, with Shadowcaster
> withdrawing, unable to let his guard down, having
> witnessed too much over the millions of years in the
> shadows, and feeling the weight of too much blood on
> his hands for those whose lives he had ended.
Phoenix
> sensed his pain internally, however she persitsted,
> determined to to break through to the bot she knew
he
> was inside.  On the night of what seemed like the
> perfect day to end the perfect cycle, she finally
> broke through, and he sobbed mech fluid
uncontrollably
> for over an hour, finally letting go of his demons,
> Phoenix holding him and comforting him the entire
> time.  It was then that he experienced one of the
> greatest miracles in the universe, he fell in love. 

> From that day onward, he went from strength to
> strength, healing more and more as the days went on,
> even starting to forgive himself for his sins during
> the war, they even procreated life in the form of
> three offspring, one who would be later known as
> Rattrap.  For the next few years, things were
perfect,
> and for the second time in his life, Shadowcaster
was
> truly at peace. However, it was soon after this that
> would not be long before an ambitious and war
> mongering Predacon would raid and steal the
> personality chip of the most dangerous Decepticon
ever
> to exist: Megatron.
> 
> When he heard the knews of the rise of Megatron,
> Shadowcaster was on edge, verging on the point of
> paranoia, however Phoenix reassured him they had
> nothing to worry about, mostly out of a youthful
sense
> of naivette. Shadowcaster after all had witnessed
> peace for so long and felt that security on
Cybertron
> would be upto the task.
> 
> Soon after this, Megatron recruited some of the
worst
> Predacons in existence by means of a breakin and
> breakout of a Cybertronian maximum security prison,
> then decided to teach the ruling Maximal governing
> council on Cybertron a lesson by randomly
obliterating
> the maximal science teams on the neumerous planets
> throughout the galaxy- their first target would turn
> out to be the very team that Shadowcaster was a
member
> of.
> 
> It was a sunny, clear skied, perfect day that day.
> Shadowcaster had decided to go on a scouting mission
a
> few hours north of camp to observe  the growth in
> population of the newly dominant species on that
> planet. He was half an hour away from the base when
he
> heard the massive explosions which took out the
base's
> shield generators and ripped a massive gaping hole
> through the center of its hull.  Knowing instantly
> what it could only mean he raced back there as fast
as
> he could, bearly overloading his servos in the
> process.
> Nothing could have prepared him for what he saw when
> he returned, with most of his team mates dismembered
> beyond the point of repair, their sparks
extinguished.
> 
> 
> His mind started racing, as he rushed all over the
> base looking for her. He found her in the CR Chamber
> area, mech fluid gushing, and clearly looking like
she
> was not going to make it, as she lay over another
> small bot that Shadowcaster couldn't quite make out.

> He transformed and held her in his arms, begging her
> to hang on, feeling like he was about to break in
two
> at the very sight of her in that state.  She kept
> saying how she was sorry and that she couldn't save
> them, then begging him to hold on to the light. All
he
> could do was beg her to stay- it was then that her
> spark extinguished.  
> 
> Thrity seconds later, the Predacon who Megatron had
> left behind to take care of any scouts who had been
in
> the field stumbled upon him.  It was then that the
> programmijng that the Quintessons originally tried
to
> install in him took over, as he moved at blight
speed,
> ripping the would be killer's limbs off violently
and
> at mach speed. The Predacon begged Shadowcaster for
> mercy, at which point he was told that he would
> receive the mercy that scum like him deserve.  The
> scream which the hapless Predacon gave out as he was
> savaged to death rang out for miles like a symphony
of
> death resonating through a concert hall.
> 
> It was when he went to pick up Phoenix that he
noticed
> the bot she had been trying to protect- their son
> Rattrap- he was in stasis lock and severely damaged,
> but he would live. Not wasting an instant,
> Shadowcaster placed him in the nearest working CR
> Chamber and then repaired the base enough to get a
> distress beacon working.
> 
> Blaming himself for the incident due to him letting
> his guard down, Shadowcaster vowed to never allow
> himself the luxury of peace ever again. He returned
to
> a secret life in the shadows, secretly augmenting
> himself once more for combat, and resuming the one
man
> war he once fought against the Predacons. However,
> things had now changed, this time around he blamed
the
> Maximals and the Autobots for allowing the Predacons
> the oportunity to exist, viewing th Pax Cybertronia
as
> a slap in the face to all those that the Decepticons
> and their decendants had caused pain to over the
eons.
> Soon after the attacks on the colonies, Shadowcaster
> caught wind of Megatron's plan to steal the Golden
> disk.  At this, Shadowcaster raided a top secret
> weapons factory storing as many high powered and
> lethal weapons as he could in subspace, then, after
> rigging the flight control computers in Iacon
command
> so that the Axalon would be the only ship capable of
> catching up with the rogue Predacons, then replacing
> one of the protoform filled stasis pods on board the
> Axalon with and empty one modified by him to design
> specifications which he pre programmed into the
> scanning program., which he then boarded.
> 
> He awoke after the quantum surge, then a transmetal
> Panther with a third tank mode and a psychotic
> disposition towards the Predacons, and a cold
> resolution to remove any obstacles in his path to
> their eradication.  After losing a major battle with
> Megatron not long after he landed, Shadowcaster
> decided there was only one weapon that he could use
to
> overcome Megatron- the Autobot Matrix of leadership.

> He then began a quest from Africa to North America,
> finally reaching his destination. Getting past
> Teletran 1 was easy, after all, it was his creation.
> Finding his was to Optimus Prime's stasis filled
body,
> he quickly removed the matrix, and took tis power
for
> his own.  However, what resulted was the last thing
he
> expected- as he found hiself confronted with his own
> demons and ghosts, and forced to find true peace. He
> awoke 4 times his post upgrade size, with a blending
> of his original G1 form and his Maximal form, and
with
> everything in balance for the first time in his
life.
> 
> However, before he returned the Matrix, he knew
there
> was one more thing he had to do- pass on its power
to
> Optimus Primal, resulting in the birth of Optimal
> Optimus. They then returned to the Ark, and restored
> order to it, while at the same time, upgrading
> defences, to stop any attempt at temporal sabotage
by
> megatron.
> 
> Over the course of the next year, they went from
> strength to strength, until Megatron showed his
trump
> card, the Nemesis.  Knowing that if nothing was
done,
> the Maximals, and perhaps the Autobots and humans
> would be destroyed and history forever altered,
> Shadocaster launched a successful frontal assault
> against the nemesis, severely crippling it, however,
> the attack resulted in the destrustion of his life. 
> 
> Finding himself in the Allspark, he now spends what
he
> expects to be the rest of eternity in peace. 
However,
> life doesn't always turn out as we plan it.....
> 
> Abilities: Shadowcaster's name comes from his
> incredible cloaking device, which allows him to move
> around unseen and undetected by all tracking systems
> in any of his three forms.  In addition, he is
> equipped with a low powered anti gravity system,
> allowing him to hover just far enough off the ground
> so as not to leave any tracks. He has a
communications
> array which contains a broadband scrambler system,
> capable of scrambling all communications up to a
10km
> radius. 
> 
> His large, TM3 (think Optimal Optimus) size also
> belies incredible speed and agility, and his
> sttrenghth is such that he is capable of lifting up
to
> 60 tonnes.  A superb marksman- contains telescoping
> optic sensors, allowing him to lock onto a hex nut
> from 3km away.  In jet mode, can attain speeds of up
> to mach 1.5 at a ceiling of 10km, while in Panther
> mode he is capable of reaching speeds of 150km/h and
> 500km/h in land assault mode. In all three modes,
has
> access to twin corrosion missile launchers- which
> contain warheads filled with sulfuric acid.  In jet
> and robot modes, carries an electro disruptor, which
> fries the electronics of anything it hits. In robot
> mode, he is also equipped with two retractable wrist
> blades that extend out to a length of 2m.
> 
> Weaknesses: Shadowcasters only real weakness is that
> those that know of him, know of him only as a
legend-
> if he ever actually were to get in real trouble, his
> comrades wouldn't even know of him, also,
> Shadowcasters beliefs on the combat skill of the
> average Autobot make him resistant to ever ask for
> assistance- however, the possibility of that ever
> happening is extremely remote. 
> 
> GM Note: A gift which Shadowcaster will receive from
> Primus after Primus briefs him, is a weapon of my
own
> creation called a Lock pistol, which is the
> transformer equivalent of a blowpipe with knockout
> darts. What is shoot the target with a tight beam
> transmission, which contains a computer virus which
> not only overrides the victim's system and activates
> stasis lock, but to keep them there, it makes a
> connection between two major components in a medium
> level, but non critical system (the virus is
designed
> to analyse and determine which system will be the
> ideal choice) go open circuit. Its purpose complete,
> the virus then destroys both itself and any trace of
> itself which may have been used to create an
> antivirus.  The effects of the virus can be
countered
> after stasis lock, by either a well trained medic
> which located the tricked up away and restores the
> connection, or by a very short spell in the CR
> chamber, as in no longer than 30 seconds.  The main
> purpose of this weapon will be for use on
nightstalk,
> however, in cases of emergency, Shadowcaster may
> resort to using this gun.
>
